name: Fluffy Quest
description:
Fluffy Quest is a adventure-puzzle game. You are a fluffy creature and you need to find your child then carry them to safety. But each child burden you down and make it harder to move. Also enemies and traps throws junks to hinder you down.

Unfourtanetly HTML doesnt work...

WSAD / Arrow Keys -> Move

Left Mouse Click -> Fire Blob

Space -> Use/Interract

M -> Mute Music

R -> Replay Level

Esc -> Pause the game
